mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shipin_id as shipinId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,shipin.shipin_name as shipinName ,shipin.shipin_photo as shipinPhoto ,shipin.shipin_video as shipinVideo ,shipin.shipin_delete as shipinDelete ,shipin.shipin_content as shipinContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM shipinguankanjilu a left JOIN shipin shipin ON a.shipin_id = shipin.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.shipin_id = #{params.shipinId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.shipin_id IS NOT NULL
and shipin.kecheng_id = #{params.kechengId}
and shipin.shipin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shipinName},'%')
and shipin.shipin_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.shipinVideo},'%')
and shipin.shipin_delete >= #{params.shipinDeleteStart}
and shipin.shipin_delete <= #{params.shipinDeleteEnd}
and shipin.shipin_delete = #{params.shipinDelete}
and shipin.shipin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shipinContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
